career.title: Senior React Developer
career.job_summary: Lead development projects using React, mentoring junior developers and ensuring high code quality.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain complex web applications using React.
Architect and design front-end solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Mentor and guide junior developers.
Perform code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices.
job_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
5+ years of experience in React development.
Strong understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Experience with Redux or other state management libraries.
Proficiency in version control systems like Git.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

career.title: Senior Node Developer
career.job_summary: Develop and manage scalable server-side applications using Node.js, and work closely with front-end developers.
responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy server-side applications using Node.js.
Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements.
Maintain and improve existing applications.
Ensure high performance and responsiveness of applications.
Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code.
job_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
5+ years of experience with Node.js.
Strong understanding of asynchronous programming and Node.js architecture.
Experience with RESTful APIs and microservices.
Familiarity with database technologies like MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team.

career.title: Junior React Developer
career.job_summary: Assist in the development of web applications using React, under the guidance of senior developers.
responsibilities: Develop user-friendly web applications using React.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices.
Collaborate with other developers and designers.
Fix bugs and improve application performance.
Document and maintain code.
job_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
1-2 years of experience in React development.
Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies.
Good problem-solving skills.

career.title: Senior Data Analyst
career.job_summary: Analyze complex data sets to provide actionable insights and support decision-making processes.
responsibilities: Perform detailed data analysis to identify trends and insights.
Develop and maintain data models and reporting systems.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their data needs.
Present data findings and recommendations to management.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity.
job_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field.
5+ years of experience in data analysis.
Proficiency in SQL and data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Experience with statistical analysis and predictive modeling.
Excellent communication skills.

responsibilities: Design and develop scalable web applications using React.

responsibilities: Develop and maintain high-performance web applications using React.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and deliver new features.

career.title: Senior Prompt Engineer
career.job_summary: Design and optimize prompt engineering strategies to enhance natural language processing systems.
responsibilities: Develop and refine prompt strategies for NLP models.
Analyze and interpret data to improve prompt effectiveness.
Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to integrate prompts into applications.
Conduct research to stay updated with the latest advancements in prompt engineering.
Evaluate and test prompt performance.
job_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
3-5 years of experience in prompt engineering or related field.
Strong understanding of NLP and machine learning concepts.
Experience with prompt optimization techniques.
Familiarity with programming languages such as Python or JavaScript.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
